This is a pretty nice mascara. It comes in a very nice container that looks great. The wand is a very thin and long wand that makes it easy to apply this mascara to your eye lashes.

When you apply this mascara make sure you let it dry properly. Once it is dry, it is definitely smudge and waterproof, no doubt about it but until then you can create a mess if you are not careful.

I found that I didn't necessarily get thicker eye lashes when I used them but they definitely looked longer. There was no clumping or flaking which was good. I had no negative reaction to this mascara and my eyes were happy. All in all this is a good one, great for length but no real improvement in regards to thickness.

title: Very nice spiral ties but a tad on the expensive side
text:
I have pretty long hair and most people with long hair know the issue with split ends. Last year when I was at the hair dresser I mentioned that and the hair dresser stated that the best scrunchie are these little spiral hair ties that are popping up recently. They supposedly don't cause split ends and hair breakage. I figured why not give them a shot.

These hair ties will not get soaked if you go for a swim, obviously, which is great. I did notice however that when you just pull it out of your hair you will end up pulling out some hair. I suggest you pull it out gently, preferably by either untangling it once first or by holding your pony tail at the base firmly and then pulling it out.

These spirals are fairly large and I like these a lot. They are a gorgeous minty green. After using them for a while they can stretch out a bit, but fear not, you can just put them in warm/hot water and they shrink right back to what they used to be and your have your spiral hair tie back. Or if you just don't use them for a bit they will shrink back on their own. In this pack you only get 3 for $13 so these are bit more on the expensive side to some others I have seen and gotten to date so not sure if that is worth it but these are nice and sturdy and made well.

title: Smells amazing, gentle and doesn't dry out your skin
text:
This is a fantastic cleanser by Higher Education. It comes in a very nice squeeze tube that is nice and simple but has a very clean design in line with this product line. The cleanser smells fantastic very refreshing and really amazing, one of my favorites that I have.

The cleanser does not produce a heavy lather but I don't really need that. It feels very nice on the face and cleanses gently away anything from your face. It then rinses of nice and easy and you don't have to keep going over it over and over again like some cleansers which is nice.

When you are done your face doesn't feel like you have stripped it of all its moisture which is great. It actually still feels pretty moisturized. I still follow it up with my standard moisturizing routine but I didn't feel it was really necessary which was nice so if you forgot your face won't be hurting for it. This is a fantastic cleanser that feels great on the skin and smells amazing, everything I look for in a daily moisturizer especially since it didn't strip my face of its moisture.

title: Incredible set of stunning lipsticks!
text:
I just love these Sigma Lipsticks! In this set you get 4 unique lipsticks that are all in the same color family but the colors are different enough that you actually get 4 different lipsticks and it is worth getting this set for a whopping $75! The colors are 2 beautiful earthy nudes, one more pinky nude and one stunning red tone that is just plain perfect! This is a gorgeous set in regards to colors.

Now the applicators are so unique and different and stunning on their own. They also have a magnetic closure of sorts because when you close them they kind of pull shut at the very end so they must have a magnetic closure in it.

The lipstick themselves are super creamy and feel amazing on the lips. They have a pleasant taste to them and are just amazing. There is nothing but greatness about them and these are worthy of the name Sigma! I love everything about these and can only recommend this set. Perfect to give as a gift or purchase and breakup and give individual ones as a gift since each are packaged in a box.

title: Interesting concept, way overpriced and fell short in my eyes
text:
This is an interesting concept. You get 15 bubble pads in this container. Each pad is dry though when you get them. You can actually slip your fingers into the pad which makes it easier to use these pads. With these pads you can exfoliate so that is in theory nice but I found in execution it just didn't work as well. The pads didn't have a pleasant scent, well they were actually rather scentless so to me that was rather boring.

So when you use them you wet the pads and then clean your face with them. I found that there wasn't as many bubbles as I would have expected from a "bubble pad" so that to me was disappointing. They overall cleaned my face ok and I found they didn't dry out my face too much. All in all these worked ok but I wasn't too impressed. You can get a bottle of a nice cleanser for the same price or maybe more but that will last you a lot more than just 15 applications! so to me this is way overpriced and a bit of a waste to be honest.

title: Very nice liquid eye liner
text:
I really like this eye liner. It is not too expensive. It is a nice liquid eye liner that has a nice fine tip. It is easy to use and applies nice and evenly. You could get a wing done with this one without trouble if you have a steady hand because the tip is nice and fine.

I have had no issue with smudging with this one which is nice. It is a very nice dark ebony color that looks great. I have gotten some compliments when I have used this because it just makes your eyes look great. It is easy to remove so no problems there.

title: Love this one!
text:
Oh my, now this is a very nice moisturizer by Higher Education. Even though I am not a fan of skin products coming in jars, this jar is just plain beautiful. This gold digger moisturizer smells amazing and I can't really figure out what it is, but it is the mix of cucumber and melon which is always a winning combination. It contains collagen and hyaluronic acid which are fantastic ingredients for your skin.

The cream is very lightweight and absorbs quickly into your skin. It leaves no residue behind, just soft and smooth skin that looks and feels great. You don't need a lot of this moisturizers so this jar should last you a good while. So even though it is not the cheapest cream around you still get your money's worth. I like this one, quite a bit and can only recommend it.

title: I do really like this one, slightly more expensive than others in this class
text:
This is a nice Retinol cream that is a little expensive considering it contains only 0.5% retinol. I have others that contain 3 times as much and cost half of this one. One word of caution, please keep in mind when you use products containing retinol to use sun blocker and to apply them in the evening since these can make your skin sensitive to sun light.

This serum comes in a stunning little plastic squeeze tube looking like upside down pump dispenser. It has a pleasant and mild scent that I really like.

The serum is lightweight and absorbs quickly into your skin. There is some residue for a brief while but that goes away pretty quickly. It leaves you with nice soft skin that is smooth and feels great. All in all I really do like this even though it is a bit more on the expensive side for what you get. My skin does like it though and with the lower concentration of the retinol this may work better for people who are more sensitive to retinol.

title: Very nice mattes and lots of beautiful shimmers/glitters
text:
This is a nice little eye shadow palette that contains 16 eye shadows. The palette is actually pretty small but I have yet to use up a palette to be honest so this one will still take a while. You get 5 very nice mattes that are very pigmented and blend out nicely. With those you can create very nice base looks. Then you can use the 11 different shimmers to change the looks as you please. Anything from creamy lights to golds to purples. There is a very wide variety that allows you to really change up the look.

I made some looks without eye primers and the look lasted all day without any issue. So for paying less than $10 this palette is well worth it in my eyes.

title: Fantastic oil but just not too crazy about that strong essential oil scent
text:
I am so torn about this oil. It comes in a glass dropper bottle like most oils come, mostly to protect the oil. Make sure you mix it well since the gold settles on the bottom of it, yes it has actual gold flecks in it. Besides the actual 24k gold it has all natural ingredients making this an actual edible oil. You can use this on its own or mix it with your moisturizer or foundation if you want.

So this is a high quality product and worth every penny in my eyes. When you use it you will notice the strong essential oil scent and this is why I am torn. It is just a bi too almost medicinal to me. It is a scent that in my eyes should be in a massage parlor in the essential oil diffuser healing you of something. So for me it was just rather strong but thankfully it does not longer on your face too long.

The oil is not too thick and absorbs into your skin pretty quickly. It leaves a slight oily residue on your face and I don't fault it for that since it is an oil. However, if you give it about 10 minutes or so, that oily residue disappears and you feel just soft and smooth skin. Absolutely amazing in my eyes. I love how my face felt when I used that to be honest and was a bit shocked.

So I love how it makes my face feel and look, I just need to get over the scent but since you really don't smell it on your face for long I think I can handle it.

title: Very nice palette that is easy to use, maybe a tad on the expensive side
text:
This is a very nice eye shadow palette. In it you get 2 cool brown shades that are mattes and one shimmer and one glitter shade. They are very nice colors and all go very well together so you really don't have to think hard to get a look that looks fantastic with this 4 color palette. The mattes blend easily and look great. Even a beginner should have no issue with these. I used them with and without a primer and they had fantastic staying power so no complaints there either.

The shimmer and glitter were fantastic to make the look standout. Either one works for whatever occasion you have in mind, shimmer for day to day wear and glitter for a more evening wear in my eyes.

At almost $30 for 4 colors this is a bit more on the expensive side since I have gotten some fantastic inexpensive palettes for less with a lot more colors but this is a very nice palette and great for travel really.

title: Incredible lightweight product that makes my skin feel amazing!
text:
I wasn't sure what to expect but I am a REAL fan of this deep emulsion. It comes in a cute little bottle that has a little pump dispenser on the top. The emulsion smells incredible and is one of my favorites really. It is super lightweight and feels very cooling when you use it so I really like to use this one when I saw a lot of sun during the day because it just feels fantastic and on top of that also smells great.

The emulsion absorbs very quickly into your skin and your skin feels amazingly soft. I found my skin looked great as well so this one in my eyes really ticked all the boxes. I felt there was no residue left on my skin either. I for one am a fan and can only recommend this one and the price is not bad at all at less than $30. I might have to check into more of their products. Thankfully it came with lots of samples that I will try and probably end up getting more, oh the hardship.

title: A sticky mess with an ashen yellowish color that smells funky but at least you are protected
text:
I really wanted to like this face moisturizer since I prefer using a tinted moisturizer over a foundation every day and this one on top of it also has an SPF 31 to protect your face from the sun. So to me that would be a win win situation.

It comes in a nice little pump dispenser that works very well. Unfortunately that is where the positive really stops in my eyes. The moisturizer is not too thick and almost runny but it isn't. It is very tinted so it kept up on that promise. I did NOT like the smell of it at all and that scent actually does linger while you apply it and some time after so that was definitely a bit no no in my eyes.

The applying of the moisturizer was not very pleasant since it was very sticky in my eyes. Distributing it evenly on my face took some actual work and I just didn't like that. IT was not like most moisturizers that just get nicely soaked up by your skin but because of its sticky consistency, which actually reminded me of a foundation, it took a bit. My skin also didn't feel great afterwards and I almost felt like I needed to set it with a setting powder like you would with a foundation. The color of it was also a bit off, some ashen yellowish brown that I found was not very flattering but thankfully it did not add a lot of color to my skin but actually blended into my skin after a little bit and you hardly noticed you added a tinted moisturizer.

At least while I was out and about my face was protected from the sun and I did not get sun burnt, so that was the other upside of this moisturizer. But all in all I did not care for the scent of it, the stickiness during application and that it left behind and how it really made my skin look. To me this is more a fail than anything else really.

title: Leaves your skin a bit sticky and not huge on the scent but works
text:
The Iryasa Face Cream comes in a little jar, which is not my favorite container since you obviously dip into it all the time. So I tend to wash my hands before I do that so I don't introduce dirt and such into it because that can shorten the life span of these products.

The cream itself is actually a little heavy which was surprising since it looked light and airy. It has some nice natural ingredients in it which is great. I wasn't too crazy about the smell of it though but that is because it used Geranium essential oil, which is probably one of my least favorite but I was hoping that the lemon would help cover it but it still powered through a lot.

The cream absorbs fairly quickly into your skin and but leaves a sticky residue on your skin that doesn't seem to fade for quite some time. Thankfully by using this at night you won't know since you add this last thing before you go to bed and then just fall asleep. It does add moisture to your skin so in the morning your skin does feel pretty nice.

title: Fantastic product that does what it promises
text:
I really like this Tone Up Cream. It is a great little moisturizer that I like to use during the day a lot. It adds a nice little glow I find to my skin that just gives it a little extra. I don't like to wear foundation every day but instead like to wear tinted kind of products on occasion, just a little bit of something. This one is along those lines just a step back I think since it only adds a bit of glow really while giving a lot of moisture to your skin which it really needs right now. With wearing masks a lot my face is suffering and this really helps countering those effects.

This moisturizer comes in a cute little squeeze tube that I do like. It smells very nice, a scent I can't pin point but is very lovely.

title: Nice but stays greasy for quite a bit
text:
This is a pretty nice face oil. It comes in a little dropper bottle that is pretty cute. I admit it smells like an essential oil and contains lavender, cypress and sweet orange, all scents I like.

The oil is not very heavy and absorbs into your skin fairly quickly. It is a quite oily though and takes quite some time to absorb into your skin. But you can expect that from a face oil if you ask me. Unlike another oil from Lua this one stays oily though, not sure why that is. Because of the oil your face is soft though but that is mostly because of that greasiness. Probably after about an hour or two that goes away and your skin is nice and soft.

title: Perfect to dress up longer hair
text:
This is a nice set of scrunchies. You get quite a variety of different scrunchies in this. You get some simple ring scrunchies I guess they call them that are my personal favorite, mostly because the colors are absolutely amazing in this trio. Then you get a trio of bunny ear style scrunchies that is also very cute and decorative and lastly a trio of scarf scrunchies that is very decorative as well.

In addition you get 7 hair pins to dress up your hair that are very cute. I still have to learn how to use this the right way and make them work in my hair. I have finer hair so these tend to slide out but I know there is a trick to make them stay in place. This is definitely a cute set that is worth getting to dress up your hair.

title: Nice moisturizing sheet mask that smells nice
text:
This is an pretty nice face sheet mask in my opinion. In the pack you get 4 masks for about $15, so almost $4 per mask, not the cheapest but also not the most expensive I have used to date.

The masks are very easy to use. They come individually wrapped and are folded nicely. The material of these is not the softest I have used but they work. They smell REALLY nice however, a nice gentle floral with some other tones mixed in, very nice. You use these for about 15 to 20 minutes or so and gently rub the remainder of the mask into your skin.

When I was done my skin felt pretty soft over. This mask is nice but it is not my favorite. My skin also had a nice residual scent left from the mask which I did enjoy. I would have expected a little better for the price since I have used cheaper masks that were nicer. All in all these are pretty nice though.

title: Not a fan of this soap
text: Sadly I do not care for this True-Aloe cleansing bar. It is a fairly large soap bar I give it that, however I don't care for how it smells at all. The scent of this soap bar is actually sort of off putting to be honest, which is odd considering the ingredients that it has. Also it is kind of weird that it has these weird little bumbs in it, not sure what they are. My skin felt pretty dry when I used it as well so all in all I am not a fan of this.

title: Impressively easy to use and looks great
text:
This kit is fantastic. It comes with everything you need to get your nails done with a gel manicure. It has step by step instructions that are easy to follow and you end up with great looking nails. It actually doesn't take too long either since you can cure 4 nails at a time in the UV lamp except the thumps. So far I have only used the gray and really like that color a lot.

Now what I really wish is that they have an adjunt kit where you can order more colors to go with the kit to mix it up some. Just having pink and gray is not enough in my eyes and let's face it having more options would be great where you could pick and choose other colors.

I love the fact that you can just peel off the nail polish when you are done instead of having to use harsh chemicals to remove it. I always hated that part and that was one reason why I don't often use nail polish, that and the fact that regular nail polish is pretty damaging to your nails. Gel nail polish is actually pretty gentle to your nails and protecting at that plus it looks great.

No complaints here, very happy with how long it took and the end results.

title: Very nice moisturizer
text:
I like this moisturizer from MD Complete. It comes in a very nice little pump dispenser that allows you to dispense the small quantities you need from this product.

The product smells very nicely of citrus and is very lightweight. This moisturizer absorbs quickly into your skin and feels just fantastic. I really feel like it does a fantastic job in the department of moisturizing your skin. Your skin looks and feels fantastic when you use this product, well at least mine does. I have had no negative reactions when I use this moisturizer.

It is reasonably priced and works well in my opinion. Personally I can recommend this.

title: Serum leaves your face pretty tacky but is scentless for those looking for one
text:
This Vitamin Brightening Ampoule by BE PLAIN is just ok in my eyes. It is pretty much scentless so that is boring but it does come in a beautiful frosted little dropper bottle. The serum is however just ok.

The serum is fairly lightweight and absorbs quickly into your skin. The downside with it however is it leaves your skin tacky and that feeling fades but never really fully goes away. There is always a bit of that tacky residue on your skin. I did not notice any significant brightening effects either so it did not come through on that promise either.

All in all this is just ok to be honest. I didn't really like how my face felt and it didn't really brighten it either. It does have some ingredients that are good for my face so at least it does some good things for my face even if I don't necessarily like how it feels when it is on, but you can always put another moisturizer on.

title: Haev seen some improvement with eyelashes and eyebrows
text: This is a nice, inexpensive conditioner for your eyelashes and eyebrows. It is very gentle and you can comfortable use it around the eyes. I have had no negative reactions not even teary eyes at any time. This product is very easy to use which is good. So far I noticed a mild increase in regards to eye lashes and my eye brows do look a little fuller. Considering the price point of this product I think it is worth the investment to see if it works for you as well.

title: Not a bad set but also not fantastic
text:
In this set you get a keratin shampoo and keratin conditioner. Both of them are sulfate free which is great, however when I read the ingredients it turns out that the shampoo actually has silicone in it, not a fan of that. Thankfully the conditioner does not seem to have any in it.

So the shampoo is not bad. The scent is decent, nothing spectacular though just ok in my eyes. It produces a nice lather that rinses out easily. What I do not like is the fact that it has silicone in it.

The conditioner in my eyes is much nicer. The big problem is, the pump dispenser does not work. The conditioner is just too thick and can not be pumped up for some reason. So the suggestion of another reviewer to switch the lids is not a bad one. The conditioner smells much nicer than the shampoo and produces a very nice soft feel on your hair while still wet. It also rinses out nicely.

When your hair is dry it does look and feel very nice. So in combination your hair does look nice when you use this combination, just not sure I am a huge fan of the shampoo in this set. All in all this gets a 3 star for me since the conditioner is pretty good, the shampoo is just below average in my eyes. As a set it may be just a tad overpriced though.

title: Ok shampoo but no thickening of my hair
text:
This shampoo is just middle of the road for me. It comes in a bottle that has a little dispense opening on the top, personally I prefer pump dispensers that just make things a lot easier. The bottle itself is actually a bit small, thought it would be bigger especially for the $20 price tag.

The smell of it was not bad but also not great. It produced a nice light lather that did a good job cleaning my hair I would say. It didn't feel like it was drying out my hair or anything. I can't say that I noticed any significant improvement on the appearance of my hair in regards of anti thinning. To me it was just a regular shampoo to be honest and for that it was overpriced and the scent not up to par.

title: Not a bad shampoo but did not notice any thickening of my hair
text:
This shampoo is just middle of the road for me. It comes in a bottle that has a little dispense opening on the top, personally I prefer pump dispensers that just make things a lot easier. The bottle itself is actually a bit small, thought it would be bigger especially for the $20 price tag.

The smell of it was not bad but also not great. It produced a nice light lather that did a good job cleaning my hair I would say. It didn't feel like it was drying out my hair or anything. I can't say that I noticed any significant improvement on the appearance of my hair in regards of anti thinning. To me it was just a regular shampoo to be honest and for that it was overpriced and the scent not up to par.

title: Patchy and not easy to blend, no mattes - not every day wear!
text:
I am sad to say this eye shadow palette just isn't for me. The colors themselves would actually be pretty nice overall, but they disappoint in their application.

So first of there are no mattes, so you can only use this for accents when using other eye shadow palettes really to use the shimmers nad glitters in this one. the colors are not bad, except they are not very pigmented at all and you really don't get very good payoff when you use them. And then of course there is the white one with the chunky sequins in it, you should not under any circumstances use this on your eyes, that is just plain dangerous! Use it on your cheeks, your body but not on your eyes, that is just not safe at all!

They claim that with this palette you can complete a perfect eye shadow makeup, well no, you can not. There is no matte and no transition shade. There is just no way you can create a look from this palette. Plus I actually tried, they do not blend at all.

title: Read the description carefull, says it is actually for fungus and will make your nails fall off
text:
Beware, this is a product that is meant for nails with toe fungus and to completely remove those nails and start fresh!

They make it sound like it is to strengthen nails that may need some help but once you read the instructions on the box it actually tells you when you use this product that your nail will fall off.

It smells pretty horrific. So unless you have severe nail fungus and want your nails to fall off, don't use this. I haven't tried it since that is not what I wanted. When I got this I read the "renews, restores and dehydrates damaged nails, repairs and protects" not makes your nails fall of. So with that being said, I will have to pass actually using this product.

title: Incredible sheet mask that makes your face really happy
text:
This is a very nice sheet face mask. It is very easy to use, basically a sheet mask that you put over your face. I like the fact that it comes in two pieces so you really can make it fit perfectly to your face. The one pieces are just one fits all kind of masks and lets face it, not all faces are the same scie or shape and therefore they just don't all fit. With this one you have a lot of nice wriggle room which is great.

It is very easy to put on. Once it is on you let it sit for about 15 to 20 minutes (btw, if you go longer you get more of the goodies). So just have a good show on tv or a book handy to read. I did notice that it is fairly heavy though but it amazingly did not slip on me but I was afraid that it may.

This mask smells beautifully of roses and for once not overpowering of it. I am not the biggest fan of the smell of roses but this one was pleasant since it was not this cloying smell of it. This is a collagen mask and when you remove it you can tell how soft your face is. I really liked this mask but it is on the more expensive side. You get 4 masks in the box for $25, so each is about $6, so that is a bit on the higher end of sheet masks but they are very nice.

title: Not a bad facial serum but does make your face somewhat tacky
text:
This is an interesting serum for your face. The bottle comes in this interesting dropper bottle that only shows the dropper when you unscrew the cap. The serum is a milky kind of solution, so make sure you mix it well before you use it just to make sure it is well mixed.

The serum is kind of thick but absorbs quickly into your skin. Your skin stays tacky for about an hour or so. After that it becomes fairly nice and soft.

The serum does have a scent to it but I can't describe it. It is fairly nice though so no complaints there. I have had no negative skin reactions or issues when I used this product. This to me is a little over average.

title: Very nice, just slipped a little bit
text:
These are nice under eye patch masks. They have a nice mild citrus type of scent, almost like mango so not sure how they can say they are unscented because they are not. I personally really like the scent so that is a plus in my eyes. Also surprised how some reviewers say they are unscented. So confusing.

These come with a small pair of plastic tweezers to help you get the little patches out. The patches come in a cute little jar. The patches are thicker, gel like and very nice. I had an issue with them staying in place though. You keep them on for about 10 to 15 minutes or so. By that time they are almost dry so all the active ingredients are mostly in your skin or on by the time you are done. The rest you just let absorb when you remove the patches.

The patches are nice and cooling and I really like how they feel on. I just wish they wouldn't slip since they did slip on me a bit. Not a big deal just a little annoyance.

title: It works quite nicely but is this really a bit issue? Who knew
text:
This hair finishing stick works quite well. It comes in a similar tube as your eye mascara does and also has a similar wand to it. The gel is clear and very lightweight. It feels almost like water when you have it on your hair really. It is not sticky or greasy really.

I was surprised that it works quite well and the staying power is pretty good as well. It is fairly cheap to so not a big investment there and definitely reasonable. I am not sure how big of an issue it really is though to get something like it. I guess if you are going to a big event and you want everything to be just perfect this is a product for it, but on a day to day basis I wouldn't really bother with it. But it works and it is pretty much scentless, so no issues there at all.

title: Very nice but a little bit more expensive then others
text:
I have pretty long hair and most people with long hair know the issue with split ends. The last time I was at the hair dresser I mentioned that and the hair dresser stated that the best scrunchie are these little spiral hair ties that are popping up recently. They supposedly don't cause split ends and hair breakage. I figured why not give them a shot.

These hair ties will not get soaked if you go for a swim, obviously, which is great. I did notice however that when you just pull it out of your hair you will end up pulling out some hair. I suggest you pull it out gently, preferably by either untangling it once first or by holding your pony tail at the base firmly and then pulling it out.

These spirals are fairly large and I like these a lot. They are blue but with a tie dye kind of effect in them, super cute. After using them for a while they can stretch out a bit, but fear not, you can just put them in warm/hot water and they shrink right back to what they used to be and your have your spiral hair tie back. Or if you just don't use them for a bit they will shrink back on their own. In this pack you only get 3 for $10 so these are bit more on the expensive side to some others I have seen and gotten.

title: Can't say I am a fan, overpriced and not very moisturizing
text:
This is an ok face day lotion. It comes in a beautiful pump dispenser however which I personally prefer. It does have some nice ingredients like shea butter and hyaluronic acid.

Where it lacks is its scent. It doesn't have a scent that is worth writing home about. I didn't care for it at all and thankfully it doesn't linger on your skin either.

When you use this moisturizer it is pretty light but is sticky on your skin when you use it. It does absorb fairly quickly though. My skin just felt ok when I used this. It didn't feel super soft or anything nor did it look anything spectacular. This to me was just a middle of the road kind of moisturizer. Now considering all this and the cost of $63, I just can't recommend this product. I think it is overpriced and for what you get I am just not a fan at all.

title: Work great for what they are meant for
text:
In today's age when you are restricted with how much liquids you can bring along on your travels on an airplane, it makes sense to fill these little refillable atomizer bottles with your favorite perfume to bring along so you can have them in your carry on luggage. Some times you don't even have a checked in luggage so this is important.

I like that in this pack you get 5 different ones. You can dedicate each one to a different perfume so you can bring different ones on your travel. These work very well and you can bring enough on your travels for at least a week plus. They are easy to fill and use and work very well. These are on the cheaper side but for what they are intended these work perfectly well.

title: Not bad but not the greatest either
text:
You get a lot of hyaluronic acid serum in this bottle. It is pretty much scent less for those who prefer that this one is perfect in that regards. There were no hints of thyme, so not sure if it should smell of it since it is in their name? It feels very tacky on your skin when you apply it and stays that way for a few minutes. So it does take a few minutes to fully absorb into your skin. Your skin feels pretty soft after that, not the softest I have experienced but not bad overall.

They recommend to rub it in until it is absorbed, that is a bit tough since it is so sticky. All in all not a bad product but definitely not my favorite.

Someone did make a good point about this coming in a plastic bottle. I ended up looking it up and it does have a fairly low pH. That does make me wonder what it does to that plastic bottle and if over time it will dissolve that plastic bottle.

title: Work as promised
text: These reusable makeup remover pads environmentally friendly since you can wash them and reuse them which I prefer, which is awesome. Plus they are just so much nicer on your skin. It comes with 16 bamboo/cotton pads and 5x bamboo/cotton/charcoal pads. These are super soft and for sensitive areas. You also get a little mesh pouch where you can store these pads in and also wash them in the washer. This way you won't loose them. It seems they really thought of everything you could possible need! I have been looking for something like these for some time and this is the perfect set. I wish they would have just made all in darker colors so they don't show the makeup stains at all but it is ok the way it is and I can work with it. Fantastic buy of a high quality product!

title: Just ok in my eyes, did dry out my skin somewhat
text:
This is a gentle facial cleanser that works very well. It doesn't have a pleasant scent I enjoy but it is not horrible. My skin did feel a bit dry after I used this though and I would have wished it would be more hydrating as they promised. I had to follow it up with a nice moisturizer to make sure my skin didn't dry out too much when I use this cleanser. In my eyes this cleanser is just ok. I was a bit disappointed by the entire line to be honest. It is a bit on the more expensive side with all their products being at least $34 and up. Some of them are on the even more expensive side in my eyes for what you get. They do tend to fall short on the fragrance side across the board.

This line is just not for me and did not perform well for me overall. This cleanser did not hydrate but it did cleanse well and was gentle, so at least it performed along those lines. So for that I gave it a 3 star rating.

title: Very nice mascara but a little bit overpriced
text:
This is a very nice mascara. It does come however in a cheaper looking container I think, at least to me the cartoonish container looks cheaper. I didn't think it really added that much volume to my lashes as much as it actually lengthened them which is fine. It added a good amount of length to be honest and did add a little bit of volume though. I do believe you can build this up to more thickness but then you would get that spidery look that I do not care for.

The wand is a nice thin wand that helps not making a mess all over. The bristles are shorter and make it very easy to use. The mascara is smudge proof. I had it on for a solid 16 hours and it did not budge until I used a makeup remover and it came off very easy at that point.

This is a nice mascara and it will cost you $18. I have some others that perform similarly that are cheaper than this one though so it is a bit overpriced in my eyes.

title: Great gift set
text:
This is a fantastic little gift set. It contains a moisturizing cream and an overnight night mask that both come in beautiful little jars.

These smell lovely of rose water. They contain some great ingredients like squalene, retinol, Aloe Vera, shea butter, chamomile, hyaluronic acid, argan oil, collagen and more. This is really a little power house.

Both are on the lighter side and absorb quickly into your skin. Your skin looks and feels great when you use these. I really this and this makes for a great gift. The price is also fantastic.

title: Help those poor abused hands
text:
This is a very nice hand care bundle for very hands on people. First you get a very nice hand cleaner that contains activated charcoal. This detoxes and cleans very nicely of the toughest dirt, eliminating strong odor but doesn't damage your hands like some strong cleaners might do.

Next you get a moisturizing and healing cream. This is great for those who have done some damage to their hands in some physical hand jobs where they hand up with dry and cracked hands. This gives back some moisture and heals those hands.

Last but not least is a nice protect and moisturizer. This adds a nice barrier to your hands but also adds much needed hydration to much abused hands that are dry, cracked and scaly. When you have this on your hands it is much easy to wash and wipe away stubborn dirt.

This is a nice little set that can also be gifted, especially for people who work with their hands like mechanics or wood workers but many others. This works really well and will help restore some of those much abused hands.

title: I don't like menthol, but if you do this is not bad
text:
I really wanted to like this but I am just not a fan. It has a very strong menthol scent to it that I just am not big on. I am very sensitive to menthol smells and can't stand it. This one is very strong and overpowering.

It does have a refreshing feel to it but the smell of menthol just overpowers everything. My skin was soft when I used it and did not dry out so that is great. So for those who like menthol this is great, but for me this just doesn't work.

title: Fantastic hair clips
text:
These are very nice hair clips. I am impressed on how strong these are. In this pack you get 4 clips for each of the 3 colors, clear, brown and black. I have long hair but on the thinner side and these clips had no issue holding my hair together. I think the key is the design and how they made the teeth.

These hair clips are very well made and look great. I am impressed on how good these really are and really like using these.

title: Bargain face mask that feels great
text:
This is a very nice face mask. It is very easy to use, basically a sheet mask that you put over your face and let sit for about 15 to 20 minutes. So just have a good show on tv or a book handy to read.

This mask smells beautifully of roses. It feeds your skin it feels like with the serum it contains and leaves your skin soft and healthy. Your face will look and feel great. This is a nice little treat for yourself. You will get 10 masks in this pack which is actually a really nice deal.

title: Gentle cleanser that smells beautifully
text: I did not know what to expect with this facial cleansing milk. It comes in this nice bottle. When you dispense it onto your hand you will notice it is a lotion like cleanser. It smells beautifully and is one of my favorite cleansers actually. It is super gentle and really cleanses your face nicely. There is nothing bad about this product really, it smells fantastic, is gentle and does a very nice job cleansing your face. This is a winner all around and my usual go to product.

title: Beautifully scent duo that performs nicely
text:
This is now the third product from Taya I have tried out, and I have to say this line does not dissappoint. This is probably the most fancy dispenser I have had to date and the most fancy looking bottle. The shampoo is this super creamy, beautiful creamy shampoo. It does not produce a massive lather but to cleanse your hair that is not necessary. You will also notice the incredible smell it has. The conditioner smells the same. I have a body spray that it reminds me off and it is just incredible.

This set is a bit on the more expensive side but my hair does look, feel and smell amazing when I use it, so I use this on my splurge and pamper days. They do make some claims for anti breakage and some ingredients that supposedly help with that. I can't really confirm those claims but I do really like this set a lot. It also comes in this unique bottle with an interesting dispensing mechanism and unlike some I had no issues with it whatsoever.

title: Very nice moisturizine cream
text:
This hydrating cream by Sustainable Youth is one of their better products in my eyes. It is a pretty heavy cream but it does absorb fairly quickly and fully into your skin. It smells heavily of citrus, so finally one of their products actually smells good. Most of their products I have tried to date either don't have a scent or smell kind of bad. Considering how expensive they are in general that is just not acceptable in my eyes. Thankfully this one actually smells pretty good since it is also pretty expensive.

This heavier cream actually leaves behind very soft skin that looks good. I liked how my skin felt. The scent of it does dissipate fairly quickly though but that is ok. All in all this is probably my favorite product in their line. Would I repurchase, probably not because their are products out there as good and better for a similar price or cheaper. But from this line this is their best product in my opinion.

title: The bag is gorgeous but don't bother with the brushes
text:
This is a very cute makeup bag. The coloring of it is just gorgeous and the main reason I got it really. The material is super soft. It comes with a hand strap that allows you to quickly grab it. On the inside it has a mash pocket on the side that allows you to keep smaller items secured. It is a pretty decent size that allows you to bring all your makeup on your travels.

It came with some beauty blenders that are pretty good. The makeup brushes that came with it however are just plain cheap and in my opinion crap. You can make them work but I personally don't care for them and have better ones, so there is just no time I will really use them. Plus the weird handle they have really doesn't make them very user friendly either. These are just a waste in my eyes and not sure why they even bothered with them.

The bag itself however is gorgeous and a win. I actually had a tough time deciding which color to get because they are all so cute!

title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
text: This is a nice makeup holder with some "bling". Apparently I have accumulated too many products over the last few months and was in need of additional storage. This one is similar to another one I have. Just like with other ones with a lazy Susan the shelves are adjustable which is great since you have products of different size. On the top it has different sections so you can put some items like small bottles, eye liners, brushes, mascara and so on in there to keep those organized as well, which my other two lazy Susan organizers do not have, so this is kind of neat in my eyes. All my organizers are just a tad different so I keep them for different purposes, this one is great for lotions, dropper bottles and mascaras and such. It is very sturdy and a great addition to keep my things organized.

title: Fantastic lip balm
text:
This set of lip balm is very nice. It applies easily and leaves your lips feeling nice and soft without feeling greasy or tacky. They taste of tangerine which is great. I admit, for lip balms I want one that has a good flavor at this point and this one delivers 100%. It is packed with great for your lips ingredients such as hemp seed oil, Vitamin E and olive oil and no, it does not taste like olive oil. It is cruelty free which is another bonus in my eyes.

It was a bit tricky to open though but once you get it it is actually a neat design, instead of twisting it on the bottom you twist it right by the bottom of the cap.

title: Very nice face serum by Merlot
text:
This is the third product I have tried by Merlot and I also like this one, so 2 out of 3 is not bad. This serum is packed with peptides, resveratrol and grape seed extract.

You don't need a lot of this and what you apply quickly absorbs into your skin. It smells great and smells of grapes, which is actually a rare scent in beauty products and nice for a change. My skin felt and looked great when I used this serum. The price is also very reasonable so I for one can recommend this. I am also a fan of the pump dispenser, it is clean and easy to work with and keeps the rest of the product clean as well.

title: Perfectly moisturized skin that smells heavenly of coconut
text:
Now this is a body lotion I can only recommend. It is in very classy blue bottle and packed with some very good ingredients like almond oil, Vitamin C, E and K, and Kale, and you will feel that.

First when you use it, you will notice this heavenly smell of coconut! I love coconut so when a lotion smells of coconut and makes me smell of it, well I am 100% in favor of it. But it gets better. Once you use this on your skin, it leaves you with super soft, beautiful looking skin that smells of coconut. You don't need a lot of this lotion and it quickly and fully absorbs into your skin.

This for me is a perfect body lotion.

title: Gives you BEAUTIFUL eyelashes and is smudge proof!
text:
Now this is quite the mascara. First of it comes in this beautiful container, full of bling, so this is for the girly girl of girls. I have to say I was a bit oh my when I saw that since I am not your girly girl. BUT when I used this I was rather impressed. I didn't think it really thickened my lashes as much as it actually lengthened them which is fine. I didn't apply a ton since I used it during the day and not for a night out in town. It added a good amount of length to be honest and it didn't look fake, it was a "wet eyelashes" kind of look that I really liked. I do believe you can build this up to more thickness.

The wand is a nice thin wand that helps not making a mess all over. The bristles are shorter and make it very easy to use. The mascara is waterproof and definitely smudge proof. I had it on for a solid 16 hours and it did not budge until I used a makeup remover and it came off very easy at that point.

I was very impressed with this and can only recommend this.

title: Works well and has sun protection
text:
This lip balm is just ok in my eyes. It does work and softens your lips. I do like the fact that it has sun protection in it since melanoma is a serious problem in today's age. I would have hoped that with the ingredients of coconut and grape seed that it would have had a flavor of either one in it, but sadly it does not. It was fairly tasteless actually. Nowadays a lot of lip balms are flavored and to be honest that is one of the criteria why I pick certain lip balms.

Yes this one works and its staying power is pretty good. It gets points for its sun blocking powers but I am deducting one for the lack of flavor, especially since I used other products from this line that definitely had the flavor/scent of grapes.

title: Very nice eye shadow palette especially for this price
text:
This is a very nice eye shadow palette. It comes with a total of 12 eye shadows, including 8 mattes with warm and cold tone browns and 4 shimmers, 2 warm and 2 cold tones there. I like that this palette allows you to cold or warm tone.

The eye shadows are highly pigmented and are beautiful brown shades. Even though they are highly pigmented they blend out easily, including the darkest brown in the palette. When I used the shimmers I was not able to apply them with just a brush, but when I used my fingers they applied easily with a huge payoff. They were beautiful shimmers. The one thing missing in this eye palette is a very light colored shimmer for highlighting your brow bone and your inner eye corner. Plus I also like using lighter colors for the eye lid so I wished the shimmers were a bit lighter, or at least had one lighter one in the mix.

This is a beautiful set with very nice mattes and shimmers that blend nicely and give you gorgeous looks for any occasion.

title: Love this one!
text: This is a fantastic wig! I love the length on this and how the hair curls in on the front. The hair is just plain beautiful. The red color is a beautiful burgundy color which I am a huge fan of. This a great find for anyone looking for a great wig! The hair is nice and soft and just falls like a beautiful little waterfall in the front. I love how it frames my face when I wear this. The ombre effect on it is done to perfection! Fantastic find.

title: Very nice eyelashes for the price
text: These are some nice pairs of false reusable eyelashes. They are easy to use and look great. You get 4 pairs and some tweezers to help applying them. They are made out of faux mink. I like how they make my eyes look and give my eye lashes a nice full look, great for a night out in town. These are comfortable to wear all night long since they are fairly light. I would definitely recommend them for evening use and not for day time use since they have a bit of a dramatic flare to them.

title: Very easy to use
text:
This colored hair wax works very well. It is perfect for those Halloween or cosplay occasions. If I would have gotten a different color than gray I guess I could have used it on other occasions for like accent strikes of hairs.

It is easy to use and leaves a similar feeling behind as if you used some of those colored hair sprays. The hair is a tad stiff, just like it is when you use hair wax. I don't use those kinds of products often so it is always a bit weird to me when I can't just run my fingers through my long hair.

It washes out easily without any problems. When you apply it and wash your hands it comes of easy as well. This is a very easy to use product without any issues and not very expensive so you can't really go wrong with it.

title: Nice facial cream
text:
This facial cream comes in a cute little pump dispenser.It is a gentle cream that has a pleasant scent to it that only lingers for a short little time. It quickly absorbs into your skin and leaves a beautiful looking skin behind that is very soft.

My skin had no negative reactions to it, no reddening, no rashes, nothing. My skin felt nice and moisturized when using this. I don't really have a lot of dark spots so it is tough to tell if those are lightened when using this cream.

title: Just ok in my book
text:
This goat milk cleanser is very gentle. It almost felt like a lotion when I used it. So the description that it does NOT lather is 100% accurate. I was a bit confused by that to be honest so yes read the description. It works very well that is true. It was almost completely without scent, it may have had some very mild scent but I couldn't describe what it smelled like.

To me it was weird to wash your face with something that felt more like a lotion than anything else. So this only gets an ok since it wasn't outstanding in any category really. I had no negative reactions to it and it is super gentle but that is about it.

title: Great brushes!
text:
These wooden brushes are just plain fantastic. The bristles are nice and stiff but not too stiff to hurt you. Stiff enough however to stimulate to provide a good scrub, wet or dry for that matter. You get 2 brushes in this set and one handle that you can put on either brush.
One is a nice round brush with nylon bristles that are good for scrubbing your feet that cleanses, softens and smooths the skin. The second brush is an oval brush that just has the stiff boar bristles that helps to exfoliate and smooths the skin.

Using these brushes dry helps cleanse your skin but also stimulates your lymphatic system. It promotes blood circulation, helps excrete toxins and relaxes your muscles. Plus it just feels great! You can switch the handle between these two brushes for the one you need it for which is convenient in my eyes. I really like using these and they are just good for you and feel fantastic.

title: Do not care for the scent and only works ok
text:
This serum contains Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Argireline Peptides, Vitamin E, Red Marine Algine and some others, all ingredients that are good for your skin and are similar to their face moisturizer. The consistency of the serum is however different and you need a lot less of this product I found. A tiny bit goes a long way!

This product comes in cute little pump dispenser that works very well. After I used this product I didn't think my skin felt super soft like it felt after using some other serums in comparison, it felt ok no doubt but not like with some other serums so that was a bit disappointing. I also found this product did not smell very good, similar to their moisturizer. I am not sure what it is about this line. Thankfully that scent does not linger for long.

This product is definitely not for me, and I think this line at this point may not be for me all together since I am striking out at 2 for 2.

title: Just ok in regards to moisturizing and smelt bad to me
text:
This face moisturizer containing hyaluronic acid and Vitamin C, plus some other good ingredients is not bad. It also contains glycolic acid, salicyclic acid, Vitamin A and E and really has a lot of good ingredients for your skin. It is lightweight and applies nicely to your skin. This moisturizer absorbs very quickly but your skin doesn't feel super soft after you apply it. Yes it is soft but I have other moisturizer that make my skin feel a lot softer when I use them.

It comes in this really cute pump dispenser that is very stylish. What I did not like about this moisturizer is the scent of it. I can't pinpoint what it smells like but I did not particularly care for it. Thankfully the scent does not linger very long on your skin. The other thing I did not understand that in the directions of using it it says " follow with moisturizer or makeup". Why would I have to use a moisturizer after using this moisturizer? Pretty confusing if you ask me.

All in all this product is just ok in my book. It felt ok on my skin, smelt bad to me at least and the instructions were weird to say the least. For this price you can get some other products that work better and definitely smell better!

title: Overprized and missing brush cleaner
text:
This is a decent makeup brush set. Would I pay $40 for this, NEVER. First the bag is very nice. The 4 brushes that come with it are also very nice, but are they basically worth $10 a brush, no. For that kind of money you are better of buying a Sigma brush. I was also supposed to get a makeup brush cleaner in this, but that was missing.

In this set you get a powder brush that was nice and fluffy and worked well. You also get a foundation brush that was also very nice. The flat cream concealer brush worked well and you also get a concealer detail brush that again worked really well. None of these are outstanding and any better than you can find in the beginner sets you can get for like $10 to $20 depending on the set size. So getting the bag and supposed brush cleaner that I did not get does not warrent the $40 in my eyes.

title: Just ok in my book
text: This is a nice little concealer. I used it on some scars as well as skin blemishes and it worked alright for the most part. It was true to skin color. It covered the skin blemishes beautifully but not the scars. I had no issues blending it as long as you blend it right away and it look good after you were done. I would not use it as an eye shadow primer however because of its properties.

title: Worked ok for me
text:
This pen basically is used to "fill in" larger pores with one end and the other end (black felt tip of sorts) helps smoothen it all out. The "pink" end is their primer that basically fills in whatever you want to cover up.

This "primer" has no scent to it and is very soft and almost melts into your skin. It has about light to medium coverage.

title: "Delicious" scrub
text:
I really like this lip scrub. It tastes deliciously of peach and is nice and gentle. Let's face it you don't want something that is too harsh on your lips and scrub the heck out of them. You want something nice and smooth that gently scrubs away the excess skin that is oh so annoying and tempts you into biting it off.

This scrub has Vitamin E, jojoba and coconut oil and some other nice ingredients and as I said tastes deliciously of peach. I personally am a huge fan of peach and this tastes 100% of peach and doesn't have a weird artificial flavor which is great. Thanks to the oils in this scrub your lips feel great after your wipe of the scrub.

title: Beautiful but pricey
text:
This is a very nice, well made scrunchie, but what I do not understand is, why one scrunchie is $17? I have gotten a 52 pack for $8 before and they are all very nice scrunchies. Yes I understand that the silk does not damage the hair and therefore doesn't cause split ends, but at this price it better blow dry my hair for me while I am still sleeping.

It is beautiful, the color is a very nice deep emerald green, it is very well made, the silk has no pulled threads or anything, but I don't think I would be willing to spend that kind of money on just one. If this was a 5 pack or so I would be ok with it even for silk.

title: Great!
text: My wife loves this. Hoping to get another one soon.....

title: A big Nope for me.
text: As a licensed professional I do not recommend this product. My spa owner purchased this from Amazon, when I went to try it on a PAYING CLIENT,  the glue did absolutely nothing. If the glue doesn't work then the service cannot proceed. I have done this service on many clients with a different brand and had success. This product not at all.

title: Not hand friendly
text: Not hand friendly but get the job done

title: Five Stars
text: Absolutely my FAVORITE!

title: Bad taste
text: It has a bad taste

title: Better quality than others on the market
text: I am willing to pay a few dollars extra for these razors. I've bought cheaper razors but they cut me and get dull and get rusty very fast. The Dorco brand has protective barriers on the razor so you won't cut yourself.  They work for a long time and do not rust!  My first set last 4 years before I had to replace them.  I recommend only buying DORCO.

title: Defective.
text: Defective product. The strap was too small for my head but replacing it is not possible without ripping the hair out. The attachment on one side was in the hair on the front instead of the back of the head. So it would not work even if the stap did fit unless you folded it.  In addition, some of the hair was already falling out. I added a picture of the side which was not defective. I have it two stars but the color matched my hair exactly.

title: happy
text: i bought for structure gel and builder gel.  I am happy with the brushes.

title: It's GREAT
text: I'm pleasantly surprised, it's a nice headband wig. I thought it was going to look like plastic, but it doesn't it's a nice texture. This is great for the price! Throw on an go!

title: Affordable and of Quality
text: I'm very happy with this product! Beautiful design and high quality results

title: Too small for pin curls
text: Useless. To small to use for pin curls.

title: Great matt lip color
text: Love this matt lip color!

title: Amazing diffuser!
text: Great customer service, and super cool diffuser!

title: Doesn't really work, used multiple times
text: I used it in 5 different parts of my body, and hair grew back immediately on my legs (the most noticeable body part), even after multiple uses weekly.  I followed the instructions exactly, and did not receive the results I wanted.  Overall,  with the price I paid and how it didn't work, I would not recommend this to others.

title: Plant Mister
text: This plant mister is perfect. I bought it it use on my air plants. It sprays a very fine mist and my plants are doing great!

title: Perfectly Good Shampoo
text: I love a peppermint scent, and I love when there are those oils to make your skin feel refreshed.  I thought that might be the case on your scalp with this shampoo, but it didn't.  I like the mix of peppermint and lavendar, and I think it worked just fine.  Overall, it works as well as any other shampoo.

title: Great for Acrylic/Dip Powder
text: I've recently started doing my own "dip powder" nails, which lasts SO much longer than gel.  Plus, I don't have to worry about getting a fungus from the salon.  They can be pretty tough to take off, so you HAVE TO have Acetone to get them off.  I can use this stuff on a little cotton ball, wrap my nail and cotton in tinfoil, and let them soak for a bit.  This does the trick and quickly brings the polish/powder off.  In short, it does what it's supposed to do.

title: Does not work as advertised (AT ALL)! Don't waste your money!
text: These are impossible to use! Once each eyelash is connected to the applicator, then they won't connect to each other because the magnetic in the applicator is stronger! And forget trying to manually apply. Picture trying to balance one eyelash on your eyelashes while attaching another from the bottom! The top eyelash will jump off to connect to the other one before you can even get it close! Don't waste your money.

title: Great way to save money
text: I had this item sitting in my cart for a long time. I finally placed my order because the kit would basically pay for itself after one use. I was very impressed with everything. The colors are beautiful and last. Will definitely be ordering more colors! So happy with my purchase and my only regret is not buying it sooner!

title: Love
text: So good...and I'm picky.

title: WASTE OF MONEY!
text: So Cheap! They Melt & Snap Apart as Soon as The Body Heat From Your Scalp Touches It!

title: Highly recommend
text:
I highly recommend getting a bears straightener and this one in particular.
If you have never used one, they work miracles. My beard hair is curly and seems to have a mind of its own. After using this the hair is much straiter and easier to style and manage. It also helps my beard to appear thicker and fuller.
The device is extremely well built and comes with many accessories for your beard needs.

title: Strong hold
text: Works great. Strong hold, odor isn't my favorite. Only need to use a little to go a long way.

title: Clumpy Eyelashes
text: This is probably the worst fiber lash mascara I have ever used! It just clumped all my eyelashes together! I just looked like I have clumps for eyelashes! Not good at all!

title: Awesome produc!
text: This product is AMAZING!!! It is so much healthier for your nails than dip and so much easier to file down. It does take a little getting used to but overall amazing!!!

title: Perfect for holiday!
text: I absolutely love the colors in this set! This is a perfect holiday color palette and I will definitely use this for Christmas! I also love that it come with a brush for excess powder. This is a very convenient color kit.

title: Good for Holding Hair in Place......  As a ponytail holder, no.
text:
I do find these hair clips quite sturdy! I have been using them to hold a pony tail. But not as strong to hold a ponytail on securely. The teeth are very small, and there is no grip of the hair. The clip will fall.

Many years ago, I had a ton of hair and now, sadly, it has thinned out. I now can use hair clips to hold the entire hair. I like that the clips look simple, they are not bulky and fit easily on my hair. I usually use one and/or two on the pony tail. I can wear this clip on my hair in public and it is not very visible. I am getting a lot of use right now. I like the clips! The Clips will hold a ponytail, but eventually will slide. Just use it for holding the hair back in place.

title: It's the perks you are paying for !
text:
This Norelco shaving system is just that, a system! That's what one pays for because the closeness of the razor is not near what the hand held manual razor can do. We have used this, face for hubby, legs for me, and bottom line is the shave is not as close.

There are great perks here! The multi-purpose display is excellent, indicates how much time you have left before recharging and the time is plenty! The storage case and charging stand are neat features. But for the quick shave, you need to use it too long, going over and over! It sure looks good though! ...Rizzo

title: It Works for What We Wanted It For
text:
Husband grew a beard the moment he was put on blood thinners, and he has it trimmed once a month, but sometimes that's not enough. When it gets too long he tends to look like Grizzly Adams. I would keep it tamed with scissor trims, but this works much better; he can do the trim himself, and also trim his cheeks and mustache. We haven't tried it on trimming the hair at the back of his neck.

He does not like that it is only USB and you have to buy a wall plug adapter to charge it. I guess they figure most people have them now, but it should come with one. That's just being cheap.

title: Cheap... stuck together like sandwich bags
text:
They aren't your typical shower caps. I thought I was getting a deal but they are so cheap I can barely use them twice. They are sealed together on either side so if you don't open them carefully you can rip them. They also don't stretch very much so it's not for long hair.
Don't waste your money.

title: Hate this stuff.
text: I hate this stuff. It is like clown makeup. Only Cole cream will take it off. It will clog your pores and make you break out. Only use if you really need full coverage. It would be better to head to ultra and just get a shade darker than you normally use for powder. Just avoid powders with Zinc….zinc turns white in stage lighting.

title: Great for my 7 year old
text: So cute! My 7 year old has loved playing with them. And best of all, they wash right out!! Love it!

title: Gorgeous, but texting on stick makes it difficult to use
text: They are so heavy and gorgeous that I hate to give them such a low review. The ornate heads are beautiful. They are so sturdy and are a great length for a low bun. However. The textured design that comes from the head and down the stick on some of them rip at my hair making it difficult to get them in and out of a tight bun.

title: Best makeup wipes I've used!
text: I was skeptical because of the price and I've always used Neutrogena wipes and they have always worked great. But these were so much cheaper with good reviews that I thought I would give them a try and I love them! They take the makeup off (eyeliner, mascara, foundation, lipstick - all of it) and leaves my face feeling softer and more moisturized than any other wipes I've used.

title: Works excellent a lot of power only downside is the base ...
text: Works excellent a lot of power only downside is the base not heavy enough what's the tip over as the water gets lower I still give it 5 stars for effectiveness

title: Crochet
text: I love ordering my hair from Amazon and this was great hair!

title: Pricey but Decent
text: This has worked pretty well for me over the past couple weeks of use, but I can't say it's worked better than products that cost half the price. It's a good moisturizer, but it's overpriced.

title: A Multi-Benefit Exfoliator
text: Though a bit pricey at $20 for 3.4 ounces, this face scrub does deliver solid results. It smells great, very fresh and masculine. It thoroughly exfoliates my skin and leaves it feeling soft, clean, smooth and moisturized. I've found that it's great to use before shaving, as it preps the skin by smoothing and moisturizing it.

title: Impressed!
text: Never heard of this brand but it was definitely the packaging that caught my attention. The saying "never judge a book by its cover" does NOT apply in this CASE. PLEASE try out this mascara. My lashes looked significantly longer and thicker with out any flakes or clumps. A very long lasting mascara  for a relatively decent price. Also, considering how long lasting it wore, the removal was insanely easy. I love this mascara!

title: A Good Addition
text: This is a very decent palette for the price. I like the shades offered, and they are of good quality.

title: Excellent in All Areas
text:
This is a very unique and effective product.

Used with a light pre-styler on medium-length hair:

Scent: It's a light scent. Warm and slightly spiced. Very pleasant and masculine.
Consistency: Extremely creamy. Becomes slightly tacky when emulsifying.
Styling: Smooth through the hair at first, with increasing tug the more you style. This is not a problem for me and is part of getting great hold from a product.
Finish: Slightly shiny at first, but becomes much more matte as it dries in the hair.
Hold: Legitimate all-day hold without becoming too rigid to restyle.

This is one of my new favorites. Seriously good in all areas, which is so rare. TheSalonGuy has a real winner with this one.

title: High Quality Face Moisturizer
text: I really like this moisturizer. The consistency is extremely soft and smooth, and it feels incredible on my skin. It moisturizes wonderfully and feels like it actually fortifies the skin, making it feel thicker and stronger. The scent is very fresh and it absorbs well. I am already noticing (after a few days) a slight lightening of the skin under my eyes, which is exciting. A bit pricey, but definitely high quality.

title: Really Nice
text: These bottles are very good quality. All in perfect working order. They're a great buy for the price.

title: A Soft, Moisturized Finish
text: Pricey, but it's a high quality scrub. Great texture and exfoliation.

title: Fresh and Moisturizing
text: Aside from being a tad overpriced for a daily face wash, this stuff is great. It smells like cucumber - clean and fresh, it has the consistency of aloe vera gel but a bit thicker. The lather is low-foam. It feels great on my skin, and leaves it feeling soft and moisturized. Definitely a high quality product.

title: Great Hold, but Sticky
text:
Applying to medium length hair with a light prestyler.

Scent: Very spicy. Christmas spices.
Texture: Waxy clay. Very thick.
Application: Thick and a bit tough to emulsify in the hands. A bit sticky during application.
Styling: Pretty responsive, but you have to work quickly.
Finish: Very high hold. Fairly low shine, but not matte.

title: Great Hold and Finish
text: This is a great product. The hold is strong, the finish is truly matte, and the price is a lot better than comparable clays, waxes and fibers. It has a light, masculine scent.

title: Cool and Moisturizing
text: This is definitely a "cooling" body wash. It makes my skin tingle and would be excellent in the summer months when you need to bring your body temperature down. The scent is like menthol-eucalyptus, but a bit sweeter. The lather is very thick and smooth, and it rinses away leaving my skin feeling cool and moisturized. The only reason for the 4-star rating is the price. $15 is a bit much for 6 ounces of product.

title: A Great Combination
text:
I love the combination of this shampoo and conditioner. Both smell like sweet coconut.
The shampoo has a thick and luxurious lather and definitely feels like it adds volume to my hair.
The conditioner is thick, but light, a bit like a body butter. It softens my hair and leaves it extremely soft and silky.
The only reason I can't give these products five stars is because I think they're a bit overpriced. Yes, they create great results, but so do a lot of comparable brands that are less than half the price.

title: Overpriced for What You're Getting
text: This shampoo smells great. The scent is very natural, but unfortunately it's not. Rather than using the pricier essential oils of peppermint and lavender, the company uses synthesized fragrance. The lather is decent and washes your hair about as well as any bargain-priced brand from the supermarket shelf. I did notice that it leaves my hair feeling a bit flat. There is no reason for the high price aside from name familiarity, as this brand is used by some hotel chains.

title: Deep Cleaning
text: I really like the consistency of this face wash. It's like wet clay, with a gentle and pleasant scent. It has just the right amount of lather and it spreads very easily over my face. The only drawback is that is will dry your face out. I suppose this can be countered with a basic facial moisturizer.

title: Excellent Quality Body Wash
text: This body wash is excellent. The scent is delicious, like real orange, the lather is thick with small bubbles, and it noticeably moisturizes your skin. The only drawback is the price. It's currently listed for $10 for 4 ounces, which is basically travel size.

title: Messy but works great!
text: I wasn't expecting my mirror to get a cleaning also! I was excited to finally have a water pick so when I received my package I immediately set it up and studied the directions. Once I was confident, I began and as soon as i turn it on, water went everywhere! It all ricochet ed all oclver my bathroom counter and mirror. Safe to say that you literally need to use this in the shower. But besides that, it has many attachments, different speeds and does a great job!

title: Didn't work for me.
text: This is my own personal experience with this lash growth enhancer and my own opinion. I did not notice any difference in my lashes since I started using it a month ago. I've documented my experience with pictures every 3 days. I gave it 2 stars and not 1 because I've seen that it's worked for others but I guess it isn't compatible with my biology. I'm  bit disappointed.

title: best ever
text: One liter almost lasted a year.... I forgot how much I spent but it's worth it

title: I have mixed feelings on this
text: This was a new thing for me to try.  I liked it but find myself not using it.  I thought maybe my wife would like it but it seems that she is not using it either.  It seems to take more soap than just using a washcloth.  I do like how it feels when I use it.  It feels nice on my body.  I won't give up yet, I will keep trying it.

title: Just what I needed!
text: I ordered these as replacements. They arrived on time and were just what I needed. They were affordable and practical. Definitely worth purchasing.

title: Potential.
text: Besame classic lipstick (Forever Red 1925) is creamy, moisturizing and conditioning. The color is a bright red, which gives you just the right amount of pop, especially if you are wearing a solid color (like black, blue or grey). I wish it was a deeper red, but regardless I will make it work. It makes my lips feel soft and smooth. It isn't drying at all. It doesn't bead on your lips. I wouldn't consider this a matte finish, but it isn't really shiny either. It has decent staying power (you can eat or drink while wearing it). Overall, this is a terrific lipstick to put in my rotation. I'd recommend it.

title: Time to change out my brushes.
text: I like that this set (Fragrantshare) contains a variety of (make-up) brushes. You get 18 brushes in different shapes and sizes. You get everything from a foundation brush, to one that you can apply eyeshadow with. They (black) handles are easy to hold and use. The bristles are made of animal hair.  So, far I haven't noticed any shedding. Everyone knows that you should change out your brushes every once in a while. So, give these a chance. Did I mention, this set is inexpensive, under $21 on Amazon.

title: Moisturizing and hydrating.
text: The Ikoo Infusions hair mask was surprisingly great. It is moisturizing, hydrating and nourishing. This product comes in a round (6.8 oz) container. The thick (light green) cream smells refreshing and bright.  Some of the ingredients are macadamia oil, honey extract and camellia oil. It is non-greasy but does leave a slight shine. This product is cruelty, vegan, sulfate and paraffin free (Peta approved since that is important for some consumers). I have coarse, sometimes dry hair, that after using this product made it more manageable after just one treatment. I used it as a deep conditioning treatment. It left my scalp and hair feeling refreshed and clean. I'd recommend it.

title: $50 for a plastic brush?
text: Clearly Amazon has mis-priced this brush. $50, for a plastic handled brush and firm bristles? First, I am ok with the plastic handle. It is easy to grip and hold. And since it is plastic, you don't have to worry about it looking faded after several washes (I do clean mine) like you do with the wooden ones. I'm even ok with the firm bristles (nylon and boar), because I have coarse hair and I'm not tender headed.  I like that it smooths the hair easily.  What I don't like is the PRICE. I can't believe they expect people to pay $49 for this brush. Yikes! And the sad thing is that it didn't even come in pretty packaging. Just in a simple white box. So, while I am sure I will use this brush, I can't get over the price. 2 stars

title: Leaves your skin feeling cool and refreshed.
text: LaClaire (Beverly Hills) Clarifying Cleanser is a delight on the skin. Simply add a dime sized amount, with a little water and distribute on your face with your hands (or if you prefer a loofah). The small (1.6 ounce) pump bottle is simple to use and doesn't take up too much space in the cabinet or on the counter. There are some pretty nice ingredients that include tea tree oil, salicylic acid and aloe. I've used the product for a few days now and have not noticed any dryness or irritation. Nor have I noticed any redness or rashes. The scent of the cleanser is not strong (smells like tea tree oil) and does not linger long. And finally, what I like the most? This company has made a product in a bottle that is reusable. I really like companies who have a philosophy to reduce their impact on the world. Being socially aware of how their products can affect the environment and actively doing something about it is a company that I can support. You can reuse the bottle and add liquid soap or other things.

title: Just what he needed.
text: Ordered this for my son and he really loves it. He finds that this kit is helpful because there are a variety of tools that address most skin issues. He also likes there is a kit that holds all of the tools which means that he can keep them together and doesn't have to look for them when needed.  And finally, this kit was affordable and even more reasonable than some that I have seen in several discount stores.

title: Undecided still.
text:
